Name: Airport
Story: Your department received intel about an attack on the US. You're now at the airport, ready to take on your next mission of finding the nuclear weapon and detonating it before it is launched and capturing the criminal mastermind.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the Hotel, Press 2 to go to the Subway Press 3 to go to the Diner

Name: Hotel
Story: You arrive your hotel. You settle in and plan your next moves
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the Cathedral Press 2 to go to the Mansion, Press 3 to go to the Mall.

Name: Park
Story: You are in the park. You are supposed to meet with an informant here but he never showed up.
Navigation: Press 1 to approach the man on the bench, Press 2 to go back to the hotel, Press 3 to follow the path to the School Campus

Name: School Campus
Story: You step onto the bustling school campus and you blend in as a substitute teacher, you notice whispers in the hallways.
Navigation: Press 1 to sneak into the Theater, Press 2 to go to the Mall, Press 3 to go to the Library

Name: Theater
Story: You are in the theater. You must search for clues
Navigation: Press 1 to investigate the backstage, Press 2 to go to the diner, Press 3 to venture to the office building

Name: Library
Story: You enter the library, you continue to search for clues.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the subway, Press 2 to go to the park, Press 3 to go to the Abandoned warehouse

Name: Subway
Story: You're aboard a bustling subway, surrounded by commuters.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the school, Press 2 to go to the office building, Press 3 to search the subway

Name: Mall
Story: You navigate through a bustling mall, blending in with the shoppers. You notice a strange man acting weird around you before walking away.
Navigation: Press 1 to explore the Food Court, Press 2 to go back to the hotel, Press 3 to go to the mansion

Name: Gas Station
Story: You stop by at a gas station. As you fill up your tank, a car pulls up and you realize you're not alone.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the Cathedral Press 2 to go to the gallery, Press 3 to make your way to the Subway station.

Name: Office Building
Story: You enter the office building. It is past office hours so the building is empty except for the heavily armed guards
Navigation: Press 1 to take on the guards and try to gain access, Press 2 to go to the school Press 3 to go to the diner

Name: Cathedral
Story: You enter the Cathedral. Nothing seem to be out of place but you can't be so sure
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the park, Press 2 to go to the the subway, Press 3 to go to the mall

Name: Diner
Story: You are in the diner. Your mission is to identify a member of the terrorist group among the crowd and trail him to their hideout.
Navigation: Press 1 to place an order, Press 2 to find your way to the casino, Press 3 to go to the gas station

Name: Casino
Story: You find yourself in a casino, where a notorious criminal is rumored to be hiding. Posing as a high roller, you look out for clues.
Navigation: Press 1 to play against the man in a tux at the card tables, Press 2 to go to the mansion, Press 3 to go to the Underground Tunnel entrance.

Name: Nightclub
Story: You're in a pulsating nightclub. You got intel that the gang leader is holding a meeting there. You search through the crowd, looking for him.
Navigation: Press 1 to sneak into the casino, Press 2 to go to the office building, Press 3 to go to the the mansion

Name: Mansion
Story: You enter a mansion. Clues point to the nuclear weapon being kept there  You use special tactics to bring down the two men guarding the house without raising an alarm and search the main floor
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the rooftop, Press 2 to go to the basement, Press 3 to go to the gallery

Name: Gallery
Story: You step into a grand art gallery filled with masterpieces. As you examine the paintings hoping to find valuable clues, you notice a peculiar symbol recurring across different artifacts
Navigation: Press 1 to examine the statue, Press 2 go to the night club, Press 3 to descend to the Mansion's Basement.

Name: Rooftop
Story: You climb to the rooftop of the building and search for clues of the weapon
Navigation: Press 1 to go to the basement, Press 2 to find your way to the underground tunnel, Press 3 to go to the office building

Name: Mansion's Basement
Story: You descend into the basement of the mansion still in search of the weapon or clues.
Navigation: Press 1 to enter the Underground Tunnel, Press 2 to ascend to the Rooftop, Press 3 to find your way to the warehouse

Name: Underground Tunnel
Story: You find yourself in a dark underground tunnel rumored to lead to the terrorist hideout. Your mission is to locate the hideout. The path forks ahead
Navigation: Press 1 to venture towards the glow leading to the park, Press 2 to return to the hotel, Press 3 to follow the echoing sounds from the night club.

Name: Abandoned Warehouse
Story: You enter an abandoned warehouse on the outskirts of town. New intel points to the terrorists' shipment of weapons being stached there. Your task is to uncover the weapon stash.
Navigation: Press 1 to search the warehouse, Press 2 to go to the mansion, Press  3 to go to the office building
